tool.name: buildDMUFramework

param.name: MasterMapUnitTable
param.displayname: Excel Table with Master List of MapUnits:
param.dialogReference: This is an excel file containing all the DMU information. It must contain the following values in the header "MapUnit", "Label", "Symbol", "Name", "Age", "FullName", "DMUOrder", "ParagraphyStyle", "GeoMaterial", "GeoMaterialConfidence", "Description", "AreaFillRGB", and "AreaFillPatternDescription". See an example at "https://github.com/rcrow/MapExtractor_SchemaConverter/blob/master/ReferenceFiles/MasterDMUExample.xlsx"

param.name: exampleBlankDMUTable
param.dialogReference: A correctly formatted "blank" DMUs table. Note: We created this using the GeMS "Create New Database" tool.

param.name: NullDescription
param.dialogReference: Do you want to null all the "Description" entries? If so, click the box. Use with caution; the result is not going to be GeMS compliant.

param.name: NullPattern
param.displayname: Null Areal Fill Pattern Description Field
param.dialogReference: Do you want to null all the "AreaFillPatternDescription" entries? If so, click the box.

param.name: calcIDs
param.dialogReference: Do you want to calculate the DescriptionOfMapUnits_IDs? If so, click the box.

param.name: descSourceID
param.dialogReference: Input a string here containing the DescriptionSourceID for all the DMU entries (optional).

tool.summary: This tool builds a Description of Map Units table for a specific map using the attributes in the feature classes and a master table.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool builds a Description of Map Units table for a specific map using the attributes in the feature classes and a master table.
